abstract: HSBC’s private banking unit initially said that records on 10 or fewer clients were taken when the theft occurred three years ago.
snippet: HSBC’s private banking unit initially said that records on 10 or fewer clients were taken when the theft occurred three years ago.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — HSBC said on Thursday that the theft of Swiss client data at the heart of a recent tax dispute with France was much larger than it earlier acknowledged.

headline.main: Bank Revises Number Affected by Data Theft
headline.print_headline: Bank Revises Number Affected by Data Theft
